column1: Smoque BBQ////A few things to note
column2: I wish there were more BBQ sauce options. The meal came with just one. For a BBQ place that's kinda not too legit. Also
column3: I felt a bit rushed when I was eating. The line was long
column4: and the busboys were running around cleaning plates... I guess a better option is to take your yummy food goodness to go so you can eat at your own pace at home. I can't wait to come back.
